mapper.select: select count(*) from loan_book where ${search_option} like '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

select b_name, b_author, to_char(l_lodate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')l_lodate, to_char(l_retdate, 'yyyy-mm-dd')l_retdate from lo_book l, sl_book b , sl_member m where l.l_bookid = b.b_id and l.l_memno = m.m_no and l_return_yn = 'N' and m_no = #{m_no} order by l_lodate
select (5-count(*)) l_y from sl_member m, sl_book b, lo_book l where l.l_bookid = b.b_id and l.l_memno = m.m_no and l_return_yn = 'N' and m_no=#{m_no}
select (3-count(*)) r_y from sl_member m, sl_book b, re_book r where r.r_bookid = b.b_id and r.r_memno = m.m_no and r.r_reservation >= 0 and m_no=#{m_no}
